detail_desc: Short-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with ribbing around the neckline, sleeves and hem.
Underwired bra in semi-transparent microfibre with cups that give the bust a natural shape and provide good support. Fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.
Zip-through hoodie in sweatshirt fabric with a soft brushed inside. Zip down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. The cotton content of the hoodie is organic.
Short, straight-cut dress in woven fabric with a V-neck and wide, 3/4-length sleeves with lace trims. Straight-cut hem. Partly lined.
Fine-knit tights in a soft cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Shirt in an airy cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Wide, ankle-length trousers in twill made from a wool blend with pleats at the top, side pockets and fake back pockets. Straight legs with wide, sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with a ribbed shaft and elastication around the top.
Glittery set with an Alice band and three hair clips in metal with tulle bows. Length of hair clips 6 cm.
Dungaree dress in patterned stretch twill with adjustable straps with metal fasteners, press-studs at the sides and pockets front and back.
Push-up bra in lace with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Short in a soft weave with concealed, adjustable elastication and a drawstring at the waist and fake front and back pockets.
Short-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with ribbing around the neckline, sleeves and hem.
Baby Exclusive. Tube scarf knitted in a soft cotton and silk blend.

Wide, straight-cut, knee-length shirt dress in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back with a pleat for added width. Low dropped shoulders and long, voluminous balloon sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Open chest pocket and a rounded hem with high slits in the sides. Unlined.
Blouse in an airy viscose weave in a relaxed fit with a V-neck, button placket and 3/4-length sleeves with a tab and button. Rounded hem and slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
Kimono in a patterned viscose weave with short, wide sleeves and no fasteners.
Wide trousers in a patterned, softly draping viscose weave with concealed pockets in the side seams and a high waist with wide, covered elastication.
Lined, non-wired bikini top with wide, adjustable shoulder straps, padded cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support, and a metal fastener at the back.

Long-sleeved shirt in woven fabric with an easy-iron finish. Turn-down collar, classic front, darts and a yoke at the back, narrow cuffs with adjustable buttoning, and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist.
Short fitted top in ribbed jersey with a lace-trimmed V-neck and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Socks in textured-knit cotton with rib-knit, fold-down shafts.

Running tights in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist. Zipped key pocket at one hip, reflective details, and legs with ventilating mesh sections at the back of the knees and a zip at the hems.
Swim shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and a welt back pocket with a hook and loop fastening. Mesh inner shorts.
Zip-through hoodie in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a soft brushed inside. Front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. The cotton content of the hoodie is organic.
Shorts in soft, printed cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist.
Double-layered hats in soft cotton jersey.
Microfibre leggings with an elasticated waist and lace trims at the hems.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder.
Slingbacks in imitation suede with round toes, a bow across the foot and a narrow, elasticated strap around the heel. Imitation suede insoles. Heel 2 cm.
Cropped top in a patterned weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a V-neck with a tie detail at the front, and a smocked back.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with long sleeves,a chest pocket and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Metal earrings in various sizes. Diameter from 2.3 cm to 7.6 cm.
5-pocket, ankle-length, high-waisted jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, a zip fly and button and skinny legs with raw-edge, frayed hems.
Fitted top in soft jersey made from a viscose blend with a polo neck and long sleeves.

Short, wide dress in airy, patterned chiffon with a small frill trim around the neckline and a V-neck opening at the front with narrow ties at the top. Gathered seam on the shoulders, long puff sleeves and wide cuffs with covered buttons and a small frill trim. Gathered seam at the waist and a flared skirt with a wide flounce at the hem. Satin underdress.
Leggings in washed stretch denim with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.

Suit trousers in a jacquard weave with a slight sheen. Concealed hook-and-eye fastening, zip fly, side pockets, welt back pockets and legs with creases. Slim fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and contrasting colour trims.
Calf-length dress in a crêpe weave with beaded embroidery front and back. V-neck, narrow adjustable shoulder straps, a seam at the waist and a concealed zip in one side. Lined.
Short skirt in an airy, patterned viscose weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and gently rounded hem with slits in the sides.
Socks in a fine knit containing glittery threads.
Hipster briefs in cotton jersey and lace with a low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Plastic watch with an adjustable strap and metal buckle. Width of strap approx. 2 cm, total length 24 cm. Diameter of watch 3 cm.
Metal rings in various designs. Five of the rings are decorated with stone-look beads.
Jumper in a soft rib knit with pointelle details, low dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Double ribbed trim around the neckline, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Set in soft organic cotton jersey. Short-sleeved, patterned bodysuit with press-studs at the shoulders and crotch. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Fitted top in soft jersey with short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, a chest pocket and gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy.
Short shorts in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a viscose blend with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist and rounded hems.
Top in soft slub jersey with a fake front pocket, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem.
Short-sleeved shirt in a patterned cotton weave with a yoke at the back and a rounded hem.
Pyjamas in soft satin. V-neck top with narrow adjustable shoulder straps and lace at the top. Short shorts with an elasticated waist and frilled hems.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short dress in woven fabric with a round neckline, concealed zip at the back and long sleeves with a decorative pattern made from bugle beads at the cuffs. Lined.
Short-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a unique nursing feature. The design includes a double layer at the top to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.
Lined bikini top with a mesh racer back and wide elastic hem.
Short-sleeved shirt in a printed viscose weave with a resort collar, French front and straight-cut hem with short slits in the sides.
Soft bandeau bras in jersey with decorative gathers at the front and a silicone trim at the top. Lined at the front.

Calf-length shirt dress in silk with a soft crêpe finish. Collar, buttons at the front to the waist and long raglan sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Seam at the waist with a narrow, detachable tie belt, and a gathered seam below the hips. Underdress in viscose crêpe with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Short-sleeved top in soft slub cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.

Short shirt dress in softly draping woven fabric with a sheen. Collar, concealed buttons down the front and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Unlined.
Fully lined swimsuit with a deep neckline at the back.
Long-sleeved, turtleneck top in cotton jersey. Muscle Fit – a fit designed to showcase the body’s physique with narrow shoulders and tapered sleeves to create a flattering silhouette.
Long, wide jeans in sturdy denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, side and back pockets and straight, wide legs with creases.
Classic T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Fully lined swimsuit with padded cups, a fake wrapover with draping at the top and a racer back. Concealed elastication under the bust and four narrow shoulder straps that are braided at the back.

Joggers in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist and print motifs on the legs. Side pockets, a back pocket with a concealed zip, and covered elastication at the hems. Soft brushed inside.

Top in cotton jersey with long sleeves and a button placket. Muscle fit – a fit designed to showcase the body’s natural physique with narrow shoulders and tapered sleeves to create a flattering silhouette.
Boxy, oversized shirt in an organic cotton weave with a text print pattern. Turn-down collar, French front, short sleeves, and a gently rounded hem.

Padded jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with folded seams and reflective details. Detachable, lined hood, stand-up collar and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Wind flap with a hook and loop fastening and zipped front pockets. Inner ribbing and a tab with an adjustable hook and loop fastening at the cuffs. Rounded and slightly longer at the back. Fleece lining. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
V-neck jumper in a soft, fine knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Long shirt in a linen and cotton weave with a collar, concealed buttons down the front, a pleat at the back and horizontal seam both front and back. Open chest pockets, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Slip-on fabric trainers with a decorative knot detail at the front. Canvas linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Vest top in soft, ribbed cotton jersey with decorative buttons at the top and an overlocked hem.

Sports joggers in heavy jersey with taped details. Elasticated, drawstring waist, zipped side pockets and flap leg pockets. Tapered legs with shaping seams at the knees for added mobility and wide ribbing at the hems. The polyester content of the joggers is recycled.
Lightly padded, quilted jacket in woven fabric with a small stand-up collar and zip down the front. Flap chest and front pockets with press-studs and a detachable belt at the waist. Lined.
Baby Exclusive. Swim shorts and top in textured fabric. Top with a small stand-up collar, zip-down the front and frill-trimmed raglan sleeves. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Boots in imitation leather with visible scuba linings, lacing with speed hooks at the front and a loop at the back. Canvas linings and insoles and chunky rubber soles. Heel 3.5 cm.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a motif, buttons on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Set with a long-sleeved blouse in a cotton weave and a pair of leggings in jersey. Blouse with a frill-trimmed yoke, button placket and long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Leggings with an elasticated waist.
